mapper.select: SELECT MAX(STOCK_ID) STOCK_ID, a.PRODUCT_ID ,a.NAME ,a.CURRENT_AMOUNT , a.QUANTITY, a.QUANTITY_CATEGORY_NAME ,a.WEIGHT , a.WEIGHT_CATEGORY_NAME ,a.PLMA , a.SYMBOL , a.AMOUNT , a.IO_DATE , a.MADE_DATE ,MAX(REG_DATE) AS reg_date, a.`DESC` , a.STOCK_CATEGORY_ID , a.STOCK_CATEGORY_NAME FROM STOCK_VIEW a group by PRODUCT_ID having a.NAME LIKE '%${query}%' order by current_amount desc order by reg_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCK (PLMA, AMOUNT, MADE_DATE, IO_DATE, `DESC`, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, CATEGORY_ID) values ( #{plma}, #{amount} , #{madeDate}, #{ioDate}, #{desc}, #{memberId}, #{productId}, #{categoryId} )
